instructions: Swipe up from the bottom of the screen (non-iPhone X) to reveal Control Center . iPhone X users should swipe down from the top-right corner. 3D Touch the Now Playing box to the right of the screen. Tap on the wireless icon (three circles and a triangle) next to the playback controls. Wait for the AirPlay receiver to appear in the list. Tap on your chosen receiver and play some media.

Swipe up from the bottom of the screen (non-iPhone X) to reveal Control Center . iPhone X users, swipe down from the top-right corner. Tap Screen Mirroring on the left-hand side of the screen. Wait for any nearby AirPlay devices to appear. Tap the receiver on which you would like to mirror your screen.
